column4: just installed ubuntu. its not recognising any of my drivers; what do i do? How do i install them?

what video card do you have
Im not sure. On Vista; it just said it was called "Standard VGA Graphics Adapter"? I think the sound card is fine; not sure.
you would need to find out what hardware specific name your video card is, for the driver to be installed
why is irc the prefered method of help for this
shouldnt this stuff be handled like a doctors office
this way the pros can help the joes in an orderly fashion
and we can wear lab coats and stuff

ok sis mirage 3 sounds right

you won't get 3d graphics with it
